#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
#define F(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i <= (int)(b); i++)
#define RF(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i >= (int)(b); i--)

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
        freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif
    int T,ans;
    string S;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        cin>>S;
        int N = S.length();
        ans = 0;
        F(i,0,N-1) ans += (S[i]- 'a' + 1);
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
